languages.text: "Извините, что столь бесцеремонно увела вас от остальных. Я... просто мечтала хоть миг полюбоваться живописной природой этого места". {n}Ярко-синее небо в глазах Кассии отражается словно объятое закатным заревом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Извините, что столь бесцеременно увела вас от остальных. Я... просто мечтала хоть миг полюбоваться живописной природой этого места". {n}Ярко-синее небо в глазах Кассии отражается словно объятое закатным заревом.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “原谅我如此鲁莽地将你从其他人身边‘抢’了过来。只是，这里的自然风光如此令人沉醉，我想……我想和你一起欣赏片刻。”{n}湛蓝的天空倒映在卡西娅的眼眸里，像被笼罩在一片灿烂的晚霞中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “原谅我如此鲁莽地将你从其他人身边‘抢’了过来。只是，这里的自然风光如此美丽，我想……我想和你一起欣赏片刻。”{n}湛蓝的天空倒映在卡西娅的眼眸里，像被笼罩在一片灿烂的晚霞中。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Vergebt mir, dass ich Euch so frech den anderen gestohlen habe. Aber ... Ich wollte einfach einen kurzen Augenblick lang die atemberaubende Natur hier genießen." {n}Der strahlende blaue Himmel spiegelt sich in Cassias Augen und sieht dadurch aus, als sei er in einen flammenden Sonnenuntergang getaucht.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Vergebt mir, dass ich Euch so frech den anderen gestohlen habe. Aber ... Ich wollte einfach einen kurzen Augenblick die wunderschöne Natur hier genießen." {n}Der strahlende blaue Himmel spiegelt sich in Cassias Augen und sieht dadurch aus, als sei er in einen flammenden Sonnenuntergang getaucht.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Veuillez m'excuser de vous avoir {mf|enlevé|enlevée} aux autres si effrontément. C'est juste que... je voulais simplement passer un bref instant à admirer la nature splendide de cet endroit. » {n}Le ciel bleu qui se reflète dans les yeux de Cassia paraît comme dévoré par un coucher de soleil flamboyant.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Veuillez m'excuser de vous avoir {mf|enlevé|enlevée} aux autres si effrontément. C'est juste que... je voulais simplement passer un bref instant à admirer la nature splendide de cet endroit. » {n}Le ciel bleu qui se reflète dans les yeux de Cassia paraît comme dévoré par un coucher de soleil flamboyant.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Perdone que le moleste. Es que... quería admirar un rato la fascinante naturaleza de este lugar». {n}Reflejado en los ojos de Cassia, el brillante cielo azul parece envuelto en una ardiente puesta de sol.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Perdone que le moleste. Es que... quería admirar un rato la fascinante naturaleza de este lugar». {n}Reflejado en los ojos de Cassia, el brillante cielo azul parece envuelto en una ardiente puesta de sol.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「他の人からこのように大胆にあなたを盗み出してしまうことをお許しください。あたくしはただ…短い時間、この場所で息をのむような自然を鑑賞したいと思っただけです」{n}カシアの瞳に反射して、明るい青い海は、燃えるような夕焼けに飲み込まれているように見える。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「他の人からこのように大胆にあなたを盗み出してしまうことをお許しください。あたくしはただ…短い時間、この場所で息をのむような自然を鑑賞したいと思っただけです」{n}カシアの瞳に反射して、明るい青い海は、燃えるような夕焼けに飲み込まれているように見える。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seni diğerlerinin yanından alıp götürdüğüm için kusura bakma lütfen. Ben... Bu yerin nefes kesiciliğini bir anlığına da olsa tecrübe etmek istedim." {n}Cassia'nın gözlerinden yansıyan açık, mavi gökyüzü; kıpkırmızı bir günbatımıyla harmanlanmış gibi duruyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Forgive me for so boldly stealing you away from the others. It's just... I simply wished to spend just a brief moment admiring the breathtaking nature of this place." {n}Reflected in Cassia's eyes, the bright blue sky looks as though it is engulfed in a blazing sunset.{/n}
